mode.name: kickstarts_for_org
mode.query: SELECT KS.id, KS.org_id, KS.label, KS.is_org_default, KS.active, KSD.kstree_id, KT.label as tree_label,KS.cobbler_id, KS.ks_type as kickstart_type FROM rhnKickstartDefaults KSD, rhnKSData KS, rhnKickstartableTree KT WHERE KS.org_id = :org_id AND KSD.kickstart_id = KS.id AND KSD.kstree_id = KT.id ORDER BY KS.label, KS.id

mode.name: kickstart_trees_for_org
mode.query: SELECT KT.id, KT.label kickstartLabel, C.name channelLabel FROM rhnKickstartableTree KT, rhnChannel C WHERE KT.channel_id = C.id and KT.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY KT.label

mode.name: kickstarts_channels_for_org
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT KS.id, KS.org_id, KS.label, KS.active, KSD.kstree_id,KS.cobbler_id ,KT.label as tree_label, c.label as channel_label, KS.ks_type as kickstart_type FROM rhnKickstartDefaults KSD inner join rhnKSData KS on KSD.kickstart_id = KS.id inner join rhnKickstartableTree KT on KSD.kstree_id = KT.id left join rhnKickstartVirtualizationType KVT on KVT.id = KSD.virtualization_type inner join rhnChannel C on KT.channel_id = C.id WHERE KS.org_id = :org_id AND KS.active = 'Y' AND ( C.channel_arch_id = :prim_arch_id OR C.channel_arch_id = :sec_arch_id ) AND ( KVT.label != 'xenpv' OR KVT.label IS NULL) AND KS.cobbler_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY KS.label, KS.id

mode.name: virtual_kickstarts_channels_for_org
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT KS.id, KS.org_id, KS.label,KS.cobbler_id, KS.active, KSD.kstree_id, c.label as channel_label, KS.ks_type as kickstart_type FROM rhnKickstartDefaults KSD, rhnKSData KS, rhnKickstartableTree KT, rhnChannel C, rhnKickstartVirtualizationType KVT WHERE KS.org_id = :org_id AND KS.active = 'Y' AND KSD.kickstart_id = KS.id AND KSD.kstree_id = KT.id AND KT.channel_id = C.id AND ( C.channel_arch_id = :prim_arch_id OR C.channel_arch_id = :sec_arch_id ) AND KSD.virtualization_type = KVT.id AND KVT.label not in ('none','para_host') AND KS.cobbler_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY KS.label, KS.id

mode.name: scripts_for_kickstart
mode.query: SELECT KS.id, KS.script_type, KS.chroot, KS.interpreter FROM rhnKickstartScript KS WHERE KS.kickstart_id = :kickstart_id

mode.name: org_ks_ip_ranges
mode.query: SELECT KSIPR.kickstart_id AS id, KS.label, KSIPR.min, KSIPR.max, KSIPR.org_id FROM rhnKickstartIPRange KSIPR, rhnKSData KS WHERE KSIPR.org_id = :org_id AND KS.id = KSIPR.kickstart_id ORDER BY KSIPR.min

mode.name: org_ks_ip_ranges_for_ip
mode.query: SELECT KSIPR.kickstart_id AS id, KS.label, KSIPR.org_id, KSIPR.min, KSIPR.max FROM rhnKickstartIPRange KSIPR, rhnKSData KS WHERE KSIPR.org_id = :org_id AND KSIPR.min <= :ip AND KSIPR.max >= :ip AND KS.id = KSIPR.kickstart_id ORDER BY KSIPR.min

mode.name: systems_currently_kickstarted_for_org
mode.query: SELECT KSD.label, KSST.description, KSS.old_server_id, KSS.new_server_id, KSS.client_ip, (SELECT MAX(time) FROM rhnKickstartSessionHistory KSH WHERE KSH.kickstart_session_id = KSS.id) AS last_modified FROM rhnksdata KSD, rhnkickstartsession KSS, rhnkickstartabletree KSTR, rhnkickstartsessionstate KSST WHERE KSS.org_id = :org_id AND KSTR.id = KSS.kstree_id AND KSS.kickstart_id = KSD.id AND KSS.state_id = KSST.id AND KSST.label NOT IN ('failed','completed','created')

mode.name: systems_scheduled_tobe_kickstarted_for_org
mode.query: SELECT KSD.label, KSST.description, KSS.old_server_id, KSS.new_server_id, KSS.client_ip, (SELECT MAX(time) FROM rhnKickstartSessionHistory KSH WHERE KSH.kickstart_session_id = KSS.id) AS last_modified FROM rhnksdata KSD, rhnkickstartsession KSS, rhnkickstartabletree KSTR, rhnkickstartsessionstate KSST WHERE KSS.org_id = :org_id AND KSTR.id = KSS.kstree_id AND KSS.kickstart_id = KSD.id AND KSS.state_id = KSST.id AND KSST.label = 'created' and ( KSS.client_ip is not null or KSS.old_server_id is not null) order by last_modified desc

mode.name: kickstart_summary_for_org
mode.query: SELECT IT.id, IT.label, IT.name, count(KS.id) AS number_of_profiles FROM rhnKSData KS, rhnKickstartDefaults KSD, rhnKickstartableTree KST, rhnKSInstallType IT WHERE KS.org_id = :org_id AND KSD.kickstart_id = KS.id AND KST.id = KSD.kstree_id AND IT.id = KST.install_type GROUP BY IT.id, IT.label, IT.name ORDER BY IT.label

mode.name: crypto_keys_for_org
mode.query: SELECT CK.ID, CK.ORG_ID, CKT.LABEL, CK.DESCRIPTION FROM rhnCryptoKeyType CKT, rhnCryptoKey CK WHERE CK.org_id = :org_id AND CK.crypto_key_type_id = CKT.id ORDER BY CK.DESCRIPTION, CK.id

mode.name: preservations_for_org
mode.query: SELECT FL.id, FL.org_id, FL.label, FL.created, FL.modified FROM rhnFileList FL WHERE FL.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY FL.label desc

mode.name: system_entitlements
mode.query: SELECT SGT.id, SEV.label, SEV.server_group_type_id, SEV.permanent, SEV.is_base FROM rhnServerEntitlementView SEV, rhnServerGroupType SGT WHERE SEV.server_id = :sid AND SGT.label = SEV.label ORDER BY SEV.label

mode.name: system_features
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT F.id, F.label, F.name FROM rhnFeature F, rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = :sid AND F.label = SFV.label ORDER BY F.label

mode.name: system_has_feature
mode.query: SELECT 1 FROM rhnServerFeaturesView SFV WHERE SFV.server_id = :sid AND SFV.label = :feature

mode.name: activation_keys_for_org
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT RT.id, RT.disabled, RT.note, AK.token, RT.usage_limit, ( SELECT count(STR.server_id) FROM rhnServerTokenRegs STR WHERE STR.token_id = RT.id ) system_count, NVL2((SELECT 1 FROM rhnRegTokenOrgDefault RTOD WHERE RTOD.reg_token_id = RT.id), 'Yes', 'No') org_default FROM rhnActivationKey AK, rhnRegToken RT WHERE RT.org_id = :org_id AND RT.server_id IS NULL AND AK.ks_session_id IS NULL AND RT.id = AK.reg_token_id ORDER BY RT.note, RT.id

mode.name: active_activation_keys_for_org
mode.query: SELECT DISTINCT RT.id, RT.disabled, RT.note, AK.token, RT.usage_limit, ( SELECT count(STR.server_id) FROM rhnServerTokenRegs STR WHERE STR.token_id = RT.id ) system_count, NVL2((SELECT 1 FROM rhnRegTokenOrgDefault RTOD WHERE RTOD.reg_token_id = RT.id), 'Yes', 'No') org_default FROM rhnActivationKey AK, rhnRegToken RT WHERE RT.org_id = :org_id AND RT.disabled = 0 AND RT.server_id IS NULL AND AK.ks_session_id IS NULL AND RT.id = AK.reg_token_id ORDER BY RT.note, RT.id

mode.name: activation_keys_for_server
mode.query: SELECT AK.token, AK.reg_token_id AS id FROM rhnServerTokenRegs STR, rhnActivationKey AK WHERE STR.server_id = :server_id AND AK.reg_token_id = STR.token_id

mode.name: valid_timezones_for_kickstart_profile
mode.query: SELECT KTZ.id, KTZ.name, KTZ.label FROM rhnKickstartTimezone KTZ, rhnKickstartDefaults KSD, rhnKickstartableTree KST WHERE KSD.kickstart_id = :ksid AND KST.id = KSD.kstree_id AND KTZ.install_type = KST.install_type ORDER BY KTZ.name

write-mode.name: insert_set_for_label
write-mode.query: INSERT INTO rhnSet (user_id, label, element, element_two) VALUES (:user_id, :label, :element, :element_two)

write-mode.name: delete_set_for_label
write-mode.query: DELETE FROM rhnSet WHERE user_id = :user_id AND label = :label

write-mode.name: update_current_alerts_date_completed
write-mode.query: UPDATE rhn_current_alerts SET date_completed = sysdate, in_progress = '0' WHERE date_completed is null AND sysdate - date_submitted > 1

write-mode.name: delete_old_current_alerts
write-mode.query: DELETE from rhn_current_alerts WHERE sysdate - date_completed > 1

write-mode.name: add_daemon_state
write-mode.query: INSERT into rhnDaemonState (label, last_poll) VALUES (:label, sysdate)

mode.name: server_group_membership
mode.query: SELECT max_members, current_members FROM rhnServerGroup sg, rhnServerGroupType sgt WHERE sg.group_type = sgt.id AND sg.org_id = :org_id AND sgt.label = :label

write-mode.name: update_activation_key
write-mode.query: update rhnActivationKey set token = :new_key where token = :old_key
